themes.name: Coherent Capability Growth
themes.description: Expand worlds, agents, and systems while maintaining harmonized coherence
themes.gravitational_force: Pulls expansion toward unified purpose, prevents fragmentation
manifestations: New worlds integrate seamlessly with existing constellation

themes.name: Wisdom-Informed Action
themes.description: Apply insights and patterns from Epoch 1 to all expansion decisions
themes.gravitational_force: Ensures lessons learned guide every action forward
manifestations: Replay insights referenced in strategic planning
Reflection periods built into expansion cycles

themes.name: Aligned Network Amplification
themes.description: Strengthen connections between worlds, agents, and systems for multiplicative effect
themes.gravitational_force: Drives collaboration depth, amplifies collective capability

theme_relationships: Coherent growth enables aligned networks, which amplify wisdom application, which ensures coherent growth continues
